short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send chat messages or whisper to spectators room with move numbers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically adds move numbers when you chat with your Lichess.org opponent or send "whispers" to the spectators' room. Helps them follow the thought process.
